actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To amend section 3524 of title 18, United States Code, to modify the provisions with respect to visitation rights of parents whose children are relocated under the witness protection program.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to modify provisions concerning visitation rights of parents whose children are relocated under the witness protection program to: (1) apply parent notification requirements with respect to custody or visitation of a child under a Federal court order; (2) eliminate limitations on reasonable costs payable by the Department of Justice, for visitation as provided under a court order; and (3) ensure protection of the right of the parent and child to privacy during such visitation.

titles.title: To amend section 3524 of title 18, United States Code, to modify the provisions with respect to visitation rights of parents whose children are relocated under the witness protection program.
